Package camzup.core

Interface IOriented3

All Known Implementing Classes:
CamEntity3, CurveEntity3, Entity3, ImageEntity3, MeshEntity3, TextEntity3, Transform3
public interface IOriented3
Maintains consistent behavior for 3D objects that can be rotated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Quaternion getRotation​(Quaternion target)
    Gets the object's rotation
    IOriented3 rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew)
    Rotates this object to a quaternion.
    IOriented3 rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew, float step)
    Rotates this object to a quaternion over a step in time.
    IOriented3 rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates this object by an angle around the x axis.
    IOriented3 rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates this object by an angle around the y axis.
    IOriented3 rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this object by an angle around the z axis.

  • Method Details

    • getRotation

      Gets the object's rotation
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the rotation

      Rotates this object to a quaternion.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this object

      Parameters:

      step - the step
      Returns:
      this object
